original: 《三國演義》中的虛構人物，河內太守王匡手下大將。反董聯軍在虎牢關被呂布所阻，方悅出陣挑戰呂布，交手數回就被呂布所殺。
text: A fictional character in 'The Romance of the Three Kingdoms', a general under the prefect of Hanoi, Wang Kuang. The anti-Dong coalition forces were blocked by Lu Bu at Hulao Pass. Fang Yue went out to challenge Lu Bu, and was killed by Lu Bu several times in the fight.
